title: No Friendly Error Message Shown When Data Series is Empty
description: When there is no data available for a series, the system should display a user-friendly error message to inform the user about the issue. Currently, this is not happening as expected.
OB: When there is no data available for a series, the system fails to provide a friendly error message to the user.
EB: The expected behavior is that when there is no data for a series, the system should display a user-friendly error message, informing the user about the empty dataset. This message should help the user understand the situation and take appropriate actions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Series Data' section.
3. Ensure that there is no data available for any series (empty dataset).
4. Observe that the system does not display a user-friendly error message as it should.
